text:
@realDonaldTrump This is a battle to save lives!  Despite US only constituting 4% of the global population, 25% of the World’s deaths from COVID-19 are Americans!  
US Deaths.       128,828
Global Deaths 512,331
Testing doesn’t cause deaths.  Lack of WH leadership does! #COVIDー19
